title: New: LOL Boys – Changes (Shlohmo Remix)
content:
Shlohmo is tearing it up this year, having already been name-dropped by The Weeknd / Drake, and with a bunch of killer remixes to his name, it’s no surprise that he’s spent a vast proportion of 2012 touring the world.

This new remix of LOL Boys Changes turns the original on it’s head, quickening the pace and using the vocals to illustrious effect. Is it better than the original? Quite probably, check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
